Welcome to the Trivia Game Help Screen!

 This trivia game is a very simple game made to help users test their knowledge of the information offered to them.

 The game starts out with a progress statement, followed by a question, related image, and 4 answer buttons.

 In order to answer a question, just click on the button, containing the answer you would like to give.

 You will be directed to the next page with the next question or the game over screen if you have answered all 10 questions.

 Once finished, you will be given the option to play again or go back to the trivia home screen. Play again will take you back to the first question. Home will take you back to the trivia home screen.

 To start, just go back to the trivia home screen and click 'PLAY' and you'll be on your way! HAPPY HOPPING!
